<title
    level="1"
    right="Feat 6"
    pfs="Limited"
>
[Reloading Trick](/Feats.aspx?ID=2685) <actions string="Single Action" />
</title>

<traits>
<trait label="Archetype" url="/Traits.aspx?ID=12" />
<trait label="Manipulate" url="/Traits.aspx?ID=104" />
</traits>

<column gap="tiny">

<row gap="tiny">**Source** [Pathfinder #165: Eyes of Empty Death](/Sources.aspx?ID=81) pg. 77</row>

**Archetype** [Drow Shootist](/Archetypes.aspx?ID=90)

**Frequency**
once per round

**Prerequisites**
[Drow Shootist Dedication](/Feats.aspx?ID=2683)

**Requirements**
You're holding an unloaded hand crossbow.

</column>

---

You can fire off a single shot even when unprepared. You Interact to reload your [hand crossbow](/Weapons.aspx?ID=69) and [Strike](/Actions.aspx?ID=89) with it.

**Special** If you have the [Repeating Hand Crossbow Training](/Feats.aspx?ID=2684) feat, you can use this feat with a [repeating hand crossbow](/Weapons.aspx?ID=160) to load either a bolt or a magazine, but the speed means you can fire only one bolt, then the magazine jams. You must spend a 3-action Interact activity to remove the jammed magazine and clear it before it can be used again.
name: Reloading Trick
requirement: You're holding an unloaded hand crossbow.
